title: Jessi Combs' Spirit May Have Appeared In Spine-Tingling Photo Shared by Boyfriend
text:
Jessi Combs' boyfriend spent the day planning her celebration of life and shared a photo making it clear he believes the late star is still watching over him.

Related:

Video Of Jessi Combs' Fatal Land-Speed Record Attempt Released

Jessi Combs' Boyfriend Grieves By Sharing Heartbreaking Memories of 'Fastest Woman On Four Wheels'

Jessi Combs' Boyfriend Shared A New Video Of The Late Racer 'Calling Her Shot'

Jessi Combs Death: Police Recover Computers from 'Jet Car' wreckage

Jessi Combs' Family Planning 'Celebration of Life' In Her Memory

Terry Madden, who was with the 39-year-old jet car racer when she was made the fatal attempt to break the land speed record, posted the photo to Instagram and it is mind blowing.

"Remember that time..... So this one was actually yesterday. We had just had a really rough day trying to hammer out the details for Jessi celebration. Walked out into the parking garage said our good bye, cried, told a few stories, and did our best to look happy in a picture. I’ve never been extremely faithful have always had questions, but the signs thru all this have been overwhelming. She just couldn’t be left out of this picture, love you @thejessicombs and love the fact you will always be looking over my shoulder. Can’t quite explain it but every time thru this that I have been extremely challenged she has given me the answer. We are well on the way with amazing friends to having her foundation established and I WILL make it my life mission to run this foundation in her name and fulfill as many of her dreams as humanly possible and then maybe a few more." he wrote.
description: You Have To See This Photo!
